meanings.definition: A gymnastic move in which a person springs off the ground onto their hands and then onto their feet.
meanings.sent1: During the gymnastics competition, Sarah performed a perfect handspring.
meanings.sent2: The coach taught the students how to do a handspring in their gymnastics class.
meanings.sent3: The clown attempted a handspring but ended up falling on a banana peel instead.
meanings.sent4: Her joy was like a handspring, leaping from one moment to the next with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The handspring was so graceful, it seemed as if time slowed down to admire its beauty.

meanings.definition: A forward somersault executed with a spring from the hands onto the feet.
meanings.sent1: The gymnast's handspring was the highlight of her routine.
meanings.sent2: He practiced his handspring over and over to perfect the technique.
meanings.sent3: The handspring looked like a playful dolphin jumping out of the water.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a handspring of joy, infectious and uplifting.
meanings.sent5: The handspring in the performance was so impressive that the audience gasped in awe.
